# addAnimations(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds a closure that performs animations to run alongside the edit menu interaction presentation.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func addAnimations(_ animations: @escaping () -> Void)
```

## Parameters

- **animations**: A closure that performs animations.

## Adding Animations

- **addCompletion(_:)**: Adds a closure to perform operations when the edit menu interaction presentation animations are complete.
